original_text: But the men of the army whom Amaziah sent back, not letting them go with him to battle, raided the cities of Judah, from Samaria to Beth-horon, and struck down 3,000 people in them and took much spoil.
korean_text: 아마샤가 자기와 함께 전장에 나가지 못하게 하고 돌려보낸 군사들이 사마리아에서부터 벧호론까지 유다 성읍들을 약탈하고 사람 삼천 명을 죽이고 물건을 많이 노략하였더라

sentences.original_text: But the men of the army
not letting them go with him to battle
sentences.korean_translation: 그를 따라 전투에 가지 못하게 하고

sentences.original_text: and struck down 3,000 people in them
